response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,200,000. I am offering this unique item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exceptional deal is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its market value.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it provides you with an unparalleled chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly attractive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
